title: The Eagle and the Dove
description: IN THE TWILIGHT OF IMPERIAL RUSSIA-THEIR UNTAMED LOVE BLAZED LIKE THE SUN...RONYA VON GLASMAN-She was the dove, the dark-eyed Jewish beauty, the wealthy daughter of a family with pride-and passions-all its own...BORIS PIROV-He was her eagle, the golden-haired PRince-with the fire of Russia's fiercest tribe in his veins...TAMARA-Sultry, brazen gypsy, tied to Ronya's land by law and blood, she was a forest queen, forever haunting their lives with her wild, primitive call...
author: Ruth Freeman Solomon
